entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Atlin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:02 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Teslin Airport 12:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -13.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -15.0°C
Wind: ENE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023
